page.title: 12A Harpenden Father's Day
page.content:
On a week day, rise to the alarm at 05.40, shower, dress and leave the house. For my present job, drive 70 miles to work which takes less than 90 minutes using motorway and the Dartford Tunnel. Sign the security book, brew up a pot of coffee and have breakfast whilst reviewing the days work, providing a Civil Engineering input to a new project.
Work until 16.30 or later if meeting necessetates, with a half hour break for lunch. Drive home arriving about 18.00. Sometimes early enough to collect the children from Guides or other activities. Have dinner and spend sometime with the children. Read the newspaper and watch the news on T.V., feed goldfish, cover budgie and put the dog out. Then spend some time with my computer before bed at 23.00.
